title: Advantages of growing on an aeroponic Tower Garden

tasks.task: Setup and Maintenance of Aeroponic Tower Garden
subtasks: Install system components (water reservoir, pumps, misters, etc.)
Prepare planting sites within the tower
Select and purchase 160 different plant types (if needed)
Plant seeds or seedlings in the tower's growing medium
Fill water reservoir with nutrient solution
Manage pump operation and misting cycles
Adjust pH and nutrient levels of the solution
Regularly check for any leaks or malfunctions in the system
Prune or manage plants as needed
Clean or replace components as necessary
Continue monitoring resource usage (water, nutrients) due to 95% efficiency noted
